parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The unique idenitifier for the user's contact (email or phone number)

operations.summary: Get campaign affiliate information by user contact

parameters.name: contact
parameters.description: The unique idenitifier for the user's contact (email or phone number)

operations.summary: Get earnings information by user contact

affiliate_link.description: The unique install tracking link for the end-user to share

campaign_id.description: The ID for the given campaign

info_link.description: The URL for displaying rewards program details to the end-user

install_count.description: The number of app installs garnered by this affiliate contact

end_date.description: The time beyond which the user can no longer earn rewards for this campaign. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS+00:00 (all times are UTC)

click_count.description: The number of app store clicks garnered by this affiliate contact

campaign_id.description: The ID for the given campaign

value_earned.description: Dollar amount for rewards garnered by this affiliate contact

expired.description: Indicates whether end_date is in the past
